title: Wrench
description: What situation is not improved by tossing a wrench in the works?

title: Screwdriver
description: Flat head, phillips, whatever it is, just stick it in and twist.

title: Sledgehammer
description: It's like a regular hammer, but sledge.

title: Pneumatic drill
description: Not necessarily pneumatic. Also known as a jackhammer or a kango (not too be confused with roos)

title: Chainsaw
description: Originally concieved to cut through pelvic bones during childbirth. Turns out they can cut through a lot.

title: Flint and steel
description: I am the firestarter.

title: Blowtorch
description: Keep away from eyes.

title: A Big Pointy Stick
description: It was just lying by the side of the road, but now it's in your hands.

title: A Cool Sword
description: Forged in 1372, this bad boy can cut through a dragon's scaly hide like hot churned butter from the local farm.

title: A bit of string
description: Twine, thread, yarn; you're not really sure. Probably found it in your pocket.

title: A couple of matches
description: They can burn twice as bright, or twice as long.

title: Bubblegum
description: I didn't come here to make friends, I came here to chew bubblegum.

title: Duct tape
description: Sticky and shiny.

title: A shiny rock
description: Ooh, pretty!

title: A bottle of quality water-based lubricant
description: What it says on the tin. Er, bottle.

title: Grindr
description: Get it done, quick and dirty.

title: Teeth
description: TEETH, TEETH, TEETH, TEETH...!

title: Big strong muscles
description: Maybe the real solution was inside you all along?

title: Stapler
description: Works like stitches in a pinch.

title: Hot glue gun
description: Hot and sticky. Just squeeze the trigger.

title: Parachute
description: A big circle that keeps you alive.

title: Jaws of life
description: Designed after Superman's big beefy thighs, this tool is used to extract people from wrecked cars.

title: 50ft rope
description: Better than a 49ft rope.

title: Laser pointer
description: Originally engineered as a military weapon, this laser is now found in found in offices

title: Plastic explosive
description: One of Barbie's more controversial accessories.

title: A winning smile
description: Four out of five dentists recommend it.

title: The map to the treasure
description: It appears to be stained with grog.

title: A contracter
description: Plumbling, construction, whatever you need.

title: Common sense
description: No description needed

title: A prize-winning pig
description: And the Grammy goes to...

title: A flock of Canadian geese
description: 'Honk' means 'I love you' in Goose.

title: CPR certification
description: The legal way to punch someone in the chest.

title: Can-do attitude
description: Better than a can't-do attitude, am I right??

title: Back-talk
description: Usually this gets you IN to trouble.

title: A Macbook Pro
description: It's expensive, but it works. Sometimes.

title: Key to the city
description: This is really going to open doors for you.

title: A bird's eye view
description: Sometimes you just need a little distance.

title: A sufficiently good understanding of Photoshop
description: If you're good enough, they won't even be able to tell from the pixels.

title: Auger
description: It's a drilling device used for making holes in wood or in the ground. It usually includes a rotating helical screw blade called a 'flighting' to act as a screw conveyor... Hello? Are you still there?

title: Wire stripper
description: Good for stripping insulation off of wires. Not so good for other types of stripping.

title: Awl
description: A pointed tool for boring holes. Not for use with exciting holes.

title: Egg roll
description: Comes free with a Combo 2.

title: Tire iron
description: Mostly good for tires and murders in the 1950s.

title: Ice pick
description: When you absolutey, positively need to f*** up some ice.

title: Chopsticks
description: Good for picking stuff up.

title: Self-help book
description: If you can't fix yourself, how in the hell are you going to fix something else?

title: Hot soup
description: It's good for the soul.

title: Trowel
description: A really small shovel.

title: Axe
description: For hacking and whacking and thwacking.

title: Hoe
description: Hoe money, hoe problems.

title: Shovel
description: A really big trowel.

title: Foot-powered dental polisher
description: The better way to clean your teeth with your feet.

title: Bellows
description: A hand-powered wind machine.

title: Blacksmith tongs
description: Don't use these in your salad. Or do. I'm not your mom.

title: Anvil
description: Used to hammer out metal tools, or to drop on roadrunners.

title: Needle and thread
description: It's sew easy to use!

title: Hand plane
description: Like a cheese slicer, but for wood.

title: Mindfulness & meditation
description: You'd better CHILL OUT, mister. RIGHT NOW.

title: Ketogenic diet
description: A low-carb diet that sends your body into emergency lockdown.

title: An eye for fashion
description: You know how to put together a killer outfit.

title: A thorough knowledge of cryptozoology
description: You know about all manner of mythical creatures, from Bigfoot to the Loch Ness Monster.

title: Getaway car
description: Sometimes it's better to just run away from your problems.

title: Elbow grease
description: I think it's a metaphor. Otherwise it's just gross.

title: A tablecloth
description: An indoor picnic blanket.

title: Alcohol
description: A problem solver, but also a problem causer.

title: Leather belt
description: A fashionable way to keep your pants on.

title: Bag of candy
description: It's big! There's probably every type of candy in there.

title: Can opener
description: Opens cans. What did you think it does?

title: Grappling hook
description: Used for climbing buildings and crossing canyons.

title: Can of soda
description: A sugary, fizzy beverage.

title: Rich parents
description: They can get you out of any situation. Except maybe a communist revolution.

title: A significant other
description: I mean, you're basically just keeping them around because they're useful.

title: Fire extinguisher
description: The light in your eyes went out a long time ago.

title: Pressure cooker
description: It only explodes SOME of the time.

title: A phone charger
description: And it's got the right type of plug!

title: Lifesaver
description: The plastic ring, not the candy.

title: A crisp dollar bill
description: You just printed it fresh this morning.

title: Diplomatic immunity
description: The laws of this country don't apply to you anymore.

title: Knee brace
description: Helps strengthen your knee. If you're a human, anyway.

title: Crowbar
description: Good for opening crates and skulls.

title: Drone
description: A small remote-controlled hobby aircraft.
